sourcesContent:
import { IonButton, IonCheckbox, IonCol, IonContent, IonFooter, IonGrid, IonIcon, IonItem, IonLabel, IonList, IonPage, IonPopover, IonRow, IonSearchbar, IonSegment, IonSegmentButton, IonText, IonTitle, IonToolbar } from "@ionic/react"; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import "../css/Global.css"; import "../css/Forum.css"; import TopNav from '../components/TopNav'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faClock, faCommentAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; import { faFlag, faUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { addCircleSharp, informationCircleOutline } from "ionicons/icons"; const Forum: React.FC = () => { const { register, errors, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false); const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); const onSubmit = () => { setCount(1); setChecked(true); } return ( {count === 1 && checked === true ? <> All Discussions {/* Popup for Information Button */} setShowPopover(false)}> 1. Remain respectful of other users at all times. 2. Please do not spam. The definition of spam is an irrelevant or advertising post. Any post that is considered spam will be removed. 3. Do not post offensive posts, links or images. 4. Please do not post threads text in all CAPITALS since this is considered to be shouting. Anyone who breaks any of the above rules will be banned from the forum. Let's keep this forum safe for everyone. setShowPopover(true)}> {/* Display all Questions */} Anyone going to enrol for the Cyber Security (University of Wollongong) course? ~ Martin John 21-11-2020, 5.30pm 1000 Anyone going to enrol for the Cyber Security (University of Wollongong) course? ~ Martin John 21-11-2020, 5.30pm 1000 {/* End of Display all Questions */} :
*Important Notice* Forum Rules This forum is strictly for discussion about programmes offered by SIM and its partner universities and SIM Open House. Please adhere to the following rules before posting in the forum. 1. Remain respectful of other users at all times. 2. Please do not spam. The definition of spam is an irrelevant or advertising post. Any post that is considered spam will be removed. 3. Do not post offensive posts, links or images. 4. Please do not post threads text in all CAPITALS since this is considered to be shouting. Anyone who breaks any of the above rules will be banned from the forum. Let's keep this forum safe for everyone. setChecked(e.detail.checked)} ref={register({ validate: (value) => checked === true })}> *I have read the above forum rules and agree to abide to the rules stated above. I understand that should I break any of the rules above, I may be banned from the forum. {errors.forumCheckbox && errors.forumCheckbox.type === "validate" &&
*Please check the above after reading the rules to proceed to the forum
} PROCEED TO FORUM
} {/* Bottom Tabs (After Forum Rules) */} {count === 1 && checked === true ? <> console.log(`${e.detail.value}`)}> : '' } ); }; export default Forum;
